Name: Uraj singh Roll no: CS21m521 Email:Urajuv1984@gmail.com

Steps to run
1. Install the gmp library on ubuntu sudo apt-get install libgmp3-dev
2. Run make in Assignment-5-CS6530 folder.This  will generate elgamal binary
3. Run the binary eg

Assignment-5-CS6530:$./elgamal
